content: describes the key challenges and opportunities it presents. This chapter has the following sections:  “What is AI governance?” on page 2  “Governance as a key enabler for realizing AI value” on page 4  “Challenges with governance of enterprise AI” on page 6  “An example of legislation and standards related to AI” on page 12 1 2 Ensuring Trustworthy AI with IBM watsonx.governance 1.1 What is AI governance? There is not one formal definition of AI governance that is generally accepted. Many organizations have created a definition that focuses on specific elements of the overall AI governance picture. The one that, in the opinion of the author, captures a broad spectrum succinctly best is this one from the Data & AI Alliance: ___________________________________________________________________ “A system of rules, practices, processes and tools that help an organization use AI in alignment with its values and strategies, address compliance requirements and drive trustworthy
